sanctions-discussion-page-name: Given talk page name for proposing sanctions.
sanctions-bot-name: Username of reserved user that processes sanctions.
sanctions-type-insulting-name: Name of the type for a sanction that published for insulting account name.
sanctions-type-block: Name of the type for a sanction to block account.
sanctions-temporary-username:
Temporary replaced account name. Parameters:
* $1 - An arbitrary number
sanctions-empty: Displayed when there is no sanction.
sanctions-empty-now: Displayed when there is no sanction when the user browse the page.
sanctions-empty-about-now:
Displayed when there is no sanction about a certain user. Parameters:
* $1 - the Username searched
sanctions-unable-create-new: Displayed when an anonymous user has tried to participant sanction process.
sanctions-unable-create-new-logged-in:
Displayed when an user has not right to participant sanction process but has tried. Parameters:
* $1 - the Togged user
sanctions-form-target: Label for target account name in new sanction form
sanctions-form-for-insulting-name: Label for checkbox for insulting account name
sanctions-content-placeholder: Placeholder for textarea for context of sanction
sanctions-submit: Label for button for publish sanction
sanctions-topic-revision:
Wikitext used in a sanction template. Parameters:
* $1 - The revision ID
* $2 - The title of the article
sanctions-topic-diff:
Wikitext used in a sanction template. Parameters:
* $1 - The old revision ID
* $2 The revision ID
* $3 - The title of the article
sanctions-submit-massage-added-topic:
Message displayed when the user's sumbit is success. Parameters:
* $1 - The title of the topic
sanctions-submit-massage-switched-emerge:
Message displayed when the user's change action is success. Parameters:
* $1 - The title of the topic
sanctions-submit-massage-switched-normal:
Message displayed when the user's change action is success. Parameters:
* $1 - The title of the topic
sanctions-submit-massage-executed-sancti:
Message displayed when the user's execution action is success. Parameters:
* $1 - The title of the topic
sanctions-title-with-target:
Title of [[Special:Sanctions]] when it has a target user. Parameters:
* $1 - The userName
sanctions-show-all-sanctions-link: Label for link for show all sanctions.
sanctions-row-button-execute: Label for button for execute sanction.
sanctions-row-button-toggle-emergency: Label for button for changing sanction's emergency type.
sanctions-topic-title:
Used as topic title for sanction. Parameters:
* $1 - username
* $2 - Type of the sanction
sanctions-topic-summary-status-label:
Used in topic summary. Parameters:
* $1 - Status
sanctions-topic-summary-status-passed: Status of sanction used in topic summary.
sanctions-topic-summary-status-rejected: Status of sanction used in topic summary.
sanctions-topic-summary-status-immediate: Status of sanction used in topic summary.
sanctions-topic-summary-result-predictio:
Used in topic summary. Parameters:
* $1 - expectation

Used in topic summary. Parameters:
* $1 - expected result of sanction
* $2 - Expected block expiry
sanctions-topic-summary-reason-no-partic: Used in topic summary when there is not any participant.
sanctions-topic-summary-reason-canceled-: Used in topic summary when the author of the sanction canceled it.
sanctions-topic-summary-reason-more-than:
Used in topic summary. Parameters:
* $1 - number of people agree the sanction

Used in topic summary. Parameters:
* $1 - number of people agree the sanction
sanctions-topic-summary-deadline:
Used in topic summary. $1 Parameters:
* $1 - The localized time.
sanctions-topic-auto-reply-no-count: Used as a header in an automatic reply notifies above reply is not counted.
sanctions-topic-auto-reply-unable-self-a: Used in an automatic reply to a agreement comment that written by the writer of the sanction itself.
sanctions-log-take-temporary-measure:
Text for reason of the log. Parameters:
* $1 - UUID of the topic
sanctions-log-remove-temporary-measure:
Text for reason of the log. Parameters:
* $1 - UUID of the topic
sanctions-log-take-measure:
Text for reason of the log. Parameters:
* $1 - UUID of the topic
sanctions-log-immediate-rejection:
Text for reason of the log. Parameters:
* $1 - UUID of the topic
sanctions-reason-not-logged-in: Message given to anonymous user who attempts to participant in sanction processes.
sanctions-reason-no-edit-permission: Message given to a user has not right to edit.
sanctions-reason-unsatisfying-verificati:
Message given to a user created account recently. Parameters:
* $1 - Condition for verification
* $2 - Date the account created

Message given to a user small edit counts. Parameters:
* $1 - Checked days
* $3 - Edit count of the user 
* $2 - Minimum edit count for the condition
sanctions-reason-blocked: Message given to a blocked user.
sanctions-reason-recently-blocked:
Message given to a recently blocked user. Parameters:
* $1 - date last block is expired
* $2 - The required passed days for participanting
sanctions-link-on-user-tool: Text for link displayed as user tool.
sanctions-link-on-diff: Text for link to sanction displayed on diff page.
sanctions-link-on-history: Text for link to sanction displayed on history page.
sanctions-link-on-user-contributes: Text for link to sanction displayed on user contirubutes page
sanctions-link-on-user-page: Text for link to sanction displayed on user page
sanctions-agree-template-body: Text for agree template used to vote.
sanctions-agree-with-day-template-body:
Text for agree template used to vote. Parameters:
* $1 - proposed day(s) to block
sanctions-disagree-template-body: Text for disagree template name used to vote.
sanctions-ve-vote-agree-tool-title: Title text for the agree tool on Structured Discussions's VisualEditor toolbar.
sanctions-ve-vote-disagree-tool-title: Title text for the disagree tool on Structured Discussions's VisualEditor toolbar.
sanctions-ve-agree-days-inspector-title: Title text for day selector inspector
sanctions-ve-agree-days-inspector-remove: Text of remove button on Structured Discussions's choose expiration panel (inspector) in the VisualEditor.
notification-header-sanctions-proposed-a: Header text for a notification when a sanction against your username have been proposed.
notification-header-sanctions-proposed: Header text for a notification when a sanction against your future edit have been proposed.
